January 19, 2022
Honorable Alison J. Nathan
United States District Judge
United States Courthouse
40 Foley Square
New York, NY 10007
Re: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell
S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)
Dear Judge Nathan:
Today, counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell filed her Motion for a New Trial (the "Motion") and accompanying exhibits under seal. For the reasons set forth in the Motion, we request that all submissions pertaining to Juror No. 50 remain under seal until the Court rules on the Motion.
Respectfully Submitted,
/s/
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM
cc: All Counsel of Record
DOJ-OGR-00008822
